vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Μανασσῆς, -ῆ, ὁ (Heb. מְנַשֶּׁה),
Manasseh;
__1. (a) the first-born son of Joseph;
__(b) the tribe which bore his name: Rev.7:6.
__2. King of Judah: Mat.1:10.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.41.51;
son of: Joseph (H3130) and Asenath (H0621);
brother of: Ephraim (H0669); married to Aramitess (H0761);
father of: Machir (H4353) and Asriel (H0844H)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: Manasés: (1) hijo de José, fundador de una tribu israelita (APOC.7:6) ; (2) en la genealogía de Jesús (MAT.1:10)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪拿西 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "忘記, 遺忘"
1) 約瑟的大兒子
2) 希西家的兒子, 猶大王 (太 1:10; 啟 7:6| )
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
玛拿西这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是"忘记, 遗忘"
1) 约瑟的大儿子
2) 希西家的儿子, 犹大王(太1:10 ; 启7:6| )

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A king of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.20.21;
son of: Hezekiah (H2396) and Hephzibah (H2657); married to Meshullemeth (H4922);
father of: Amon (H0526H)
